column4: anyways, i dont see how windows will stay up: the fact is linux is a much better os and its free - hopefully thanks to ubuntu microsoft will slowly dwindle to nothing
...or to completely remove windows from c if it comes to that

i really like ubuntu (used live cd and wubi before) but it seems it still lacks the "simplicity" factor. but again every os has problems and hopefully ubuntu will get better (although its already easy to use)
What do you mean by "simplicity factor'?
